sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; export const required = value => value ? undefined : Campo vazio export const minLength = min => value => value && value.length < min ? `No mínimo ${min} caracteres` : undefined export const number = value => value && isNaN(Number(value)) ? 'Digite apenas números' : undefined export const email = value => value && !/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(value) ? 'Email inválido' : undefined
